structure.unit: ARTICLE LI. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY HIV HEALTH SERVICES PLANNING COUNCIL.

text.section:
Sec. 2-555. Conflict of interest waiver.
Sections (c) and (d) of the Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance of Miami-Dade County are waived for council members for transactions arising from the exercise of those powers given the council by the Ryan White Act.
